amendment.description: To protect United States workers from competition of foreign workforces for performance of Federal and State contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Thomas for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 2660. (consideration: CR S2206; text: CR S2206) To protect United States workers from competition of foreign workforces for performance of Federal and State contracts.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Thomas for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 2660.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
